message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  It's a good deal for you considering you get anything at all!
You got 90% last round, now it's my turn to be fair. Let's meet in the middle.
Okay, I'll accept 70% this time.  That's a better split than your last offer, and we both get more than if we keep playing and risk getting nothing at all.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up yet. I think I can get a better deal if I keep pushing.
I'm getting less and less with each round, so I'll meet you halfway. 60/40 split. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not giving up control. Take it or leave it.
We're both losing value quickly. Let's split it down the middle and stop this madness.  50/50,  or we both get nothing.
